artist: Isabel Bishop; Publisher: Abrams Original Editions, New York
image_copyright: © Estate of Isabel Bishop. Courtesy of DC Moore Gallery, New York.
provenance: Dr. John C. Weber, New York (until 2016; given to Mia)
text: Isabel Bishop tirelessly experimented with traditional materials and methods in order to capture the vitality of New York City. She taught for decades at the Art Students’ League and had a studio near the busy and colorful Union Square in Manhattan.  Among her favorite subjects were crowds of people interacting in the streets and in city squares.
title: Students Walking
